title: Recruitment Officer Job at Catalyst Path Consulting
content:
Catalyst Path Consulting is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Officer
Job Location: Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Mining

About the Role


	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Recruitment Officer to join our mining operations team in Kaduna.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the end-to-end recruitment process, ensuring we attract, select, and retain top talent to support our growing workforce in the mining sector.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and implement recruitment strategies aligned with company goals.
	Manage the full recruitment cycle: job posting, screening, interviewing, and onboarding.
	Collaborate with department heads to understand staffing needs and role requirements.
	Maintain and update candidate databases and recruitment records.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, company policies, and industry standards.
	Build strong talent pipelines for technical and non-technical roles.
	Coordinate with external recruitment agencies and educational institutions.
	Prepare recruitment reports and metrics for management review.
	Support employer branding initiatives to position the company as an employer of choice.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3 - 4 years of proven recruitment experience, preferably in industrial or mining sectors.
	Strong knowledge of recruitment tools, job boards, and social media platforms.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to manage multiple recruitment processes simultaneously.
	Familiarity with Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite and HR software.


Desired Attributes:


	Strong organizational and time-management skills.
	Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
	High level of integrity and professionalism.
	Problem-solving mindset with attention to details.


Benefits


	Competitive salary package.
	Health and safety benefits.
	Professional development opportunities.
	Exposure to dynamic mining operations and career growth prospects.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: isaac.samuel@anrml.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Manager",
  "description": "Kaplo is Africa&#39;s most innovative Human Resource &amp; Business Support Solutions provider, serving clients with cutting-edge business advisory and human capital solutions across diverse sectors of the African economy.&nbsp;At Kaplo, we have proven expertise in business advisory and human resource capabilities targeted at productivity, profitability, sustainability, transformation and overall growth of your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Finance

Job Summary


	We are hiring a highly skilled Business Development Manager with compulsory finance industry experience to drive revenue growth, identify new business opportunities, and strengthen client relationships.
	The ideal candidate must have a strategic mindset, exceptional communication skills, and a proven track record of business development specifically within the finance sector.


Key Responsibilities
Business Growth &amp; Strategy:


	Develop and execute growth strategies tailored to the financial services market.
	Identify new business opportunities, partnerships, and revenue streams within the finance ecosystem.
	Conduct market and financial industry research to stay ahead of trends and competitors.


Client Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, investors, and financial stakeholders.
	Deliver tailored financial solutions to meet client needs and enhance satisfaction.
	Negotiate and close high-value deals to meet revenue targets.


Sales &amp; Revenue Generation:


	Identify, qualify, and convert leads specifically within the finance industry.
	Prepare and deliver professional proposals, pitches, and business plans for financial products/services.
	Monitor sales performance and optimize strategies for improved financial gains.


Collaboration &amp; Reporting:


	Collaborate with marketing, finance, and operations teams to support business objectives.
	Provide detailed reports on sales, market insights, revenue forecasts, and business performance.
	Ensure full compliance with company policies and financial regulatory standards.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, Economics, or a related field.
	Experience: Minimum of 5 years in business development within the finance industry (this is compulsory).


Skills:


	Strong negotiation and relationship management skills.
	Ability to identify and maximize financial business opportunities.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and networking skills.
	Proficiency in CRM tools and business/financial analytics platforms.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Demonstrated success in meeting and exceeding revenue and business development targets in the finance sector.


Benefits


	Salary: N500,000 monthly.
	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Career advancement and professional development opportunities.
	Supportive, dynamic, and growth-driven work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:&nbsp;kaploafrica@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Business Development Manager - Finance&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Business Development Manager Job at Kaplo Africa




        
    

        
        Kaplo is Africa's most innovative Human Resource & Business Support Solutions provider, serving clients with cutting-edge business advisory and human capital solutions across diverse sectors of the African economy. At Kaplo, we have proven expertise in business advisory and human resource capabilities targeted at productivity, profitability, sustainability, transformation and overall growth of your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Finance

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are hiring a highly skilled Business Development Manager with compulsory finance industry experience to drive revenue growth, identify new business opportunities, and strengthen client relationships.
	The ideal candidate must have a strategic mindset, exceptional communication skills, and a proven track record of business development specifically within the finance sector.


Key Responsibilities
Business Growth & Strategy:


	Develop and execute growth strategies tailored to the financial services market.
	Identify new business opportunities, partnerships, and revenue streams within the finance ecosystem.
	Conduct market and financial industry research to stay ahead of trends and competitors.


Client Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, investors, and financial stakeholders.
	Deliver tailored financial solutions to meet client needs and enhance satisfaction.
	Negotiate and close high-value deals to meet revenue targets.


Sales & Revenue Generation:


	Identify, qualify, and convert leads specifically within the finance industry.
	Prepare and deliver professional proposals, pitches, and business plans for financial products/services.
	Monitor sales performance and optimize strategies for improved financial gains.


Collaboration & Reporting:


	Collaborate with marketing, finance, and operations teams to support business objectives.
	Provide detailed reports on sales, market insights, revenue forecasts, and business performance.
	Ensure full compliance with company policies and financial regulatory standards.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, Economics, or a related field.
	Experience: Minimum of 5 years in business development within the finance industry (this is compulsory).


Skills:


	Strong negotiation and relationship management skills.
	Ability to identify and maximize financial business opportunities.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and networking skills.
	Proficiency in CRM tools and business/financial analytics platforms.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Demonstrated success in meeting and exceeding revenue and business development targets in the finance sector.


Benefits


	Salary: N500,000 monthly.
	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Career advancement and professional development opportunities.
	Supportive, dynamic, and growth-driven work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: kaploafrica@gmail.com using "Business Development Manager - Finance" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Full Stack Engineer",
  "description": "Duplo is building the platform to power the next generation of financial services. Our mission is to help companies expand financial access for all. Our simple and powerful banking-as-a-service API helps companies quickly launch financial products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-Time&nbsp;(Hybrid)
Department: Technology

Job Description


	This is a unique opportunity. You&#39;ll have the responsibility and resources to take a significant part in the creation of a paradigm-changing product that will impact millions.
	We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer who is comfortable with front-end, back-end and DevOps development. The ideal candidate would be responsible for designing and developing front-end web tools that deliver back office portals, customer and payment support automations and finally the needed backend services that ensure visibility, responsiveness and support to issues impacting our internal and external customer needs.
	The full stack developer would be required to see projects through from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.


Responsibilities
Frontend Development:


	Design and develop the tools and dashboards listed above using modern frameworks like React, NodeJS, NestJS and similar technologies.
	Ensure the UI/UX design is implemented correctly, making the application visually appealing and user-friendly.
	Shall use test automation best practices to guarantee the quality of solutions worked on.
	Optimize frontend performance to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience.


Backend Development:


	Develop server-side logic using Node.js, Python, Flutter (optional), Java, or PHP programming languages for our new backoffice administration platform.
	Create and manage databases using technologies like MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
	Develop and integrate Secure Restful APIs with frontend components to enable seamless communication between the client and server.
	Leverage CICD practices to build efficient delivery pipelines on Github that target multiple environments.


Database Management:


	Designs, implements, and manages relevant databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
	Ensure database security and implement measures to protect data.


Collaboration and Project Management:&nbsp;


	Work closely with designers, project managers, and other developers to create cohesive products that meet business requirements.
	Participate in all aspects of agile software development, including design, implementation, and deployment.
	Take the lead on back office projects, from conceptualization to deployment.


Performance Optimization:


	Monitor, analyze, and improve web applications for speed, scalability, and security.
	Ensure application performance, uptime, and scale, maintaining high standards for code quality and application design.


Communication and Learning:


	Engages in effective communication with cross functional team members via slack, gitHub comments, documents, and huddles.
	Stays abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages, continuously updating skills to meet evolving project needs.
	Participates in knowledge sharing.


Technical &amp; Professional Requirements


	5+ years of experience as a full stack engineer, preferably in the payments space.
	Strong technical acumen, with the ability to engage with engineers on other teams on the software architecture, our APIs, and system design that yields working software.
	Proven track record of launching and scaling solutions or financial products.
	Experience working with APIs, cloud-based architectures, microservices, and security best practices.
	Expertise in Agile, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies for product development.
	Experience driving cross-functional solutions.
	Experience with the Oncall process.
	Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with a data-driven mindset.
	Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence across teams and leadership levels.
	Experience with regulatory compliance in payments (PCI DSS, PSD2, AML/KYC) is a plus. Having integrated these requirements into your past solutions would be an added plus
",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-15",
  "validThrough": "2026-02-16",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Full Stack Engineer Job at Duplo




        
    

        
        Duplo is building the platform to power the next generation of financial services. Our mission is to help companies expand financial access for all. Our simple and powerful banking-as-a-service API helps companies quickly launch financial products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-Time (Hybrid)
Department: Technology

Job Description
     

            
    




	This is a unique opportunity. You'll have the responsibility and resources to take a significant part in the creation of a paradigm-changing product that will impact millions.
	We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer who is comfortable with front-end, back-end and DevOps development. The ideal candidate would be responsible for designing and developing front-end web tools that deliver back office portals, customer and payment support automations and finally the needed backend services that ensure visibility, responsiveness and support to issues impacting our internal and external customer needs.
	The full stack developer would be required to see projects through from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.


Responsibilities
Frontend Development:


	Design and develop the tools and dashboards listed above using modern frameworks like React, NodeJS, NestJS and similar technologies.
	Ensure the UI/UX design is implemented correctly, making the application visually appealing and user-friendly.
	Shall use test automation best practices to guarantee the quality of solutions worked on.
	Optimize frontend performance to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience.


Backend Development:


	Develop server-side logic using Node.js, Python, Flutter (optional), Java, or PHP programming languages for our new backoffice administration platform.
	Create and manage databases using technologies like MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
	Develop and integrate Secure Restful APIs with frontend components to enable seamless communication between the client and server.
	Leverage CICD practices to build efficient delivery pipelines on Github that target multiple environments.


Database Management:


	Designs, implements, and manages relevant databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
	Ensure database security and implement measures to protect data.


Collaboration and Project Management: 


	Work closely with designers, project managers, and other developers to create cohesive products that meet business requirements.
	Participate in all aspects of agile software development, including design, implementation, and deployment.
	Take the lead on back office projects, from conceptualization to deployment.


Performance Optimization:


	Monitor, analyze, and improve web applications for speed, scalability, and security.
	Ensure application performance, uptime, and scale, maintaining high standards for code quality and application design.


Communication and Learning:


	Engages in effective communication with cross functional team members via slack, gitHub comments, documents, and huddles.
	Stays abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages, continuously updating skills to meet evolving project needs.
	Participates in knowledge sharing.


Technical & Professional Requirements


	5+ years of experience as a full stack engineer, preferably in the payments space.
	Strong technical acumen, with the ability to engage with engineers on other teams on the software architecture, our APIs, and system design that yields working software.
	Proven track record of launching and scaling solutions or financial products.
	Experience working with APIs, cloud-based architectures, microservices, and security best practices.
	Expertise in Agile, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies for product development.
	Experience driving cross-functional solutions.
	Experience with the Oncall process.
	Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with a data-driven mindset.
	Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence across teams and leadership levels.
	Experience with regulatory compliance in payments (PCI DSS, PSD2, AML/KYC) is a plus. Having integrated these requirements into your past solutions would be an added plus
    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at OIC Partners
content:
OIC Partners is a forward-thinking hospitality consultancy dedicated to providing innovative, strategic solutions that elevate service standards and operational efficiency. Specializing in luxury and high-end hospitality management, we partner with hotels, restaurants, and resorts to drive growth, enhance guest experiences, and streamline operations. With a keen eye on industry trends and a focus on personalized service, we empower businesses to not only meet but exceed customer expectations.

At OIC Partners, we combine expertise, creativity, and a passion for excellence to shape the future of hospitality.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Floor Supervisor – Beach Resort
     

            
    



Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role:


	We are seeking a Floor Manager to oversee daily operations, ensure exceptional guest experiences, and manage staff efficiently at our beachfront resort.


Requirements


	Proven experience in hospitality or resort management
	Strong leadership and organizational skills
	Excellent communication and guest service abilities
	Ability to manage a dynamic, fast-paced environment.


Salary & Benefits


	N200,000 monthly
	Layover available
	13th month salary
	HMO coverage
	Daily feeding provided
	Quarterly performance bonus.


Application Closing Date: 22nd January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: employment.oic@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Cashier - Beach Resort

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role


	We are seeking Cashiers to handle daily transactions, assist guests with payments, and support smooth front-of-house operations at our beachfront resort.


Requirements


	Previous experience as a cashier or in retail/hospitality preferred
	Strong numerical and cash-handling skills
	Excellent communication and customer service skills
	Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.


Salary & Benefits


	?100,000 monthly
	Layover available
	13th month salary
	HMO coverage
	Daily feeding provided
	Quarterly performance bonus.


Application Closing Date: 22nd January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: employment.oic@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.)  Cook - Beach Resort

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos

Role


	We are seeking a Cook to prepare high-quality meals for guests and staff, maintain kitchen hygiene, and support smooth culinary operations at our beachfront resort.


Requirements


	Previous experience as a cook in a hospitality or restaurant setting
	Knowledge of food safety and hygiene standards
	Ability to prepare a variety of meals efficiently
	Strong organizational and time-management skills.


Salary & Benefits


	?100,000 monthly
	Layover available
	13th-month salary
	HMO coverage
	Daily feeding provided
	Quarterly performance bonus.


Application Closing Date: 16th February, 2026.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: employment.oic@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketer",
  "description": "Adenal Consulting is a Management and Human Resource Consulting firm that offers business advisory and consulting services to help small and medium-sized enterprises.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type:&nbsp;Hybrid

Job Summary


	We are looking for a Digital Marketer who will manage our social media platforms, create engaging brand-aligned content, design marketing materials, and support the promotion of our services, recruitment campaigns, and company growth.


Key Responsibilities


	You will manage all social media accounts for the company and any sub brands.
	You will plan and create regular content that reflects our values, services, and growth.
	You will design brochures, welcome packs, service leaflets, and marketing materials using PDF based design tools.
	You will create professional welcome packs for staff, service users, and partners.
	You will ensure all materials follow our brand style and look consistent.
	You will support recruitment campaigns with social media posts and digital flyers.
	You will track basic performance, such as engagement and reach, and adjust content accordingly.
	You will work closely with management to promote new services, inspections, and achievements.


Essential skills and experience


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree with 3 years experience.
	Strong experience managing social media for a business or organisation.
	Very good skills in designing PDFs, brochures, and documents. This is essential.
	Confident using tools such as Adobe Acrobat, Canva, InDesign, or similar.
	Ability to turn plain text into attractive and clear visual materials.
	Good writing skills with attention to tone and clarity.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Desirable:


	Experience creating welcome packs or onboarding materials.
	Basic understanding of branding and visual identity.
	Experience supporting recruitment or service promotion.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates&nbsp;should forward their CV to:&nbsp;adenalconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Digital Marketer Job at Adenal Consulting




        
    

        
        Adenal Consulting is a Management and Human Resource Consulting firm that offers business advisory and consulting services to help small and medium-sized enterprises.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Hybrid

Job Summary


	We are looking for a Digital Marketer who will manage our social media platforms, create engaging brand-aligned content, design marketing materials, and support the promotion of our services, recruitment campaigns, and company growth.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	You will manage all social media accounts for the company and any sub brands.
	You will plan and create regular content that reflects our values, services, and growth.
	You will design brochures, welcome packs, service leaflets, and marketing materials using PDF based design tools.
	You will create professional welcome packs for staff, service users, and partners.
	You will ensure all materials follow our brand style and look consistent.
	You will support recruitment campaigns with social media posts and digital flyers.
	You will track basic performance, such as engagement and reach, and adjust content accordingly.
	You will work closely with management to promote new services, inspections, and achievements.


Essential skills and experience


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 3 years experience.
	Strong experience managing social media for a business or organisation.
	Very good skills in designing PDFs, brochures, and documents. This is essential.
	Confident using tools such as Adobe Acrobat, Canva, InDesign, or similar.
	Ability to turn plain text into attractive and clear visual materials.
	Good writing skills with attention to tone and clarity.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Desirable:


	Experience creating welcome packs or onboarding materials.
	Basic understanding of branding and visual identity.
	Experience supporting recruitment or service promotion.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: adenalconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shorlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply
